abstract: The new executive, Sandra E. Peterson of Bayer, will be responsible for the company’s consumer units, which have been hit by a series of recalls.
snippet: The new executive, Sandra E. Peterson of Bayer, will be responsible for the company’s consumer units, which have been hit by a series of recalls.
lead_paragraph: Johnson & Johnson named an outsider on Thursday to fill a top leadership role overseeing its troubled consumer health unit, a break from the company’s longstanding tradition of promoting executives from within.

headline.main: J.&J. Names Outsider to Run Its Troubled Consumer Unit
headline.print_headline: J.&J. Names Outsider to Run Its Troubled Consumer Unit
